blog.description: i would literally die for ochako and thats all you shits need to know about me

summary: Ochako one day into her internship with Gunhead: Gunhead sir!! *respectful handshake* im ready to dedicate my all to hero work!!...
body:
Ochako one day into her internship with Gunhead: Gunhead sir!! *respectful handshake* im ready to dedicate my all to hero work!! No slacking off for me!

Ochako three months into her internship: *bursts through his office door with two cups of starbucks* Gunhead you wont fucking believe what my dumbass classmates did today

Gunhead: omg spill

summary: Drunk Twice kisses a statue on the lips
title: Drunk Twice kisses a statue on the lips
body:
Toga laughs and points: Statues are seagull shit collecting hookers.

Twice wiping his mouth off: TOGA WHAT THE FUCK?

Toga: Birds poop on them and you can't be the first one to think about kissing it!

summary: Want somewhere to talk about all the chracters in BNHA that are swept to the side by most of the fandom? Well look no further,...
body:
Want somewhere to talk about all the chracters in BNHA that are swept to the side by most of the fandom? Well look no further, Introducing Underloved BNHA! A server specifically for all the underrated characters where you can talk about them all you like!

Before you think about joining though! There are some requirements of who can and can not join!

You CAN NOT join if…

  • You create or consume NSFW of any of the BNHA students
  • You are a End*vor/M*tsuki/Ov*rhaul/M*neta stan or apologist
  • Are under the age of 15 or over the age of 21
  • Are an “Anti-Anti”

If you don’t fall under any of these above categories then you are more than welcome to Dm me for the invite! Hope to see you there!

blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

summary: Singing Those Songs (Like They’re Ours)
title: Singing Those Songs (Like They’re Ours)
description:
by Snowy_Rain

If only Kacchan hadn’t got a fucking girlfriend, after promising to return to Izuku before he left Musutafu, and Izuku didn’t desperately need a singing mentor.

And if only the fucking tabloids would stop bothering the new couple. That’s be great too. Izuku’s sick of reading about them already.

“You don’t have to subject yourself to torture,” Hitoshi says as he offers Izuku a napkin to wipe his snot into. “You can just google it and put a minus before the ‘bakugou’.”

“I refuse. I’m gonna make Kacchan regret f-forgetting me.”

“Yeah, sure. Come on, let’s go shop for cookies, you softie.”

—-

In which Izuku is an aspiring singer who actually sings on the streets, and he reunited with Katsuki In the unlikeliest of ways.

Words: 1233, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Todoroki Enji | Endeavor, Todoroki Shouto, Pro Heroes (My Hero Academia), Gran Torino (My Hero Academia), Shinsou Hitoshi
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Midoriya Izuku & Shinsou Hitoshi
  • Additional Tags: Cover Songs Industry AU, Alternate Universe - Music, Street Performer Midoriya Izuku, Disk Jockey Shinsou Hitoshi, Singer Bakugou Katsuki, Medium Burn, Love songs, Anonymous Lyric Black Market, Tabloids, Paparazzis, Various Songs (In Author Notes)
